svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Death rates from mental health and substance use disorders by age, World
Death rates from mental health and substance use disorders by age, measured per 100,000 individuals. These
include alcohol use, drug use, and eating disorders. Figures do not include deaths resultant from suicide, which in
some cases are related to mental health and substance use disorders.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease
